cocktails.name: Margarita
cocktails.details: Serve on the rocks with a salted rim.

cocktails.name: Martini
cocktails.details: Stirred or shaken and served in a chilled glass.

cocktails.name: Mojito
cocktails.details: Muddle mint and sugar, add rum, lime juice, ice, and top with club soda.

cocktails.name: Lychee Martini
cocktails.details: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lychee fruit.

cocktails.name: Pornstar Martini
cocktails.details: Shake all ingredients (except Champagne) with ice. Strain into a glass and serve with a shot of Champagne on the side.

cocktails.name: Old Fashioned
cocktails.details: Muddle sugar and bitters, add whiskey and ice, stir, and garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: Daiquiri
cocktails.details: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled glass.

cocktails.name: Negroni
cocktails.details: Stir with ice and strain into a rocks glass over ice, garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: Pi√±a Colada
cocktails.details: Blend with crushed ice until smooth, serve in a chilled glass, and garnish with a pineapple slice.

cocktails.name: Moscow Mule
cocktails.details: Build over ice in a copper mug, stir gently, and garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Manhattan
cocktails.details: Stir with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and garnish with a cherry.

cocktails.name: Whiskey Sour
cocktails.details: Shake with ice, strain into a rocks glass over ice, and garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

cocktails.name: Aperol Spritz
cocktails.details: Build over ice in a wine glass, stir gently, and garnish with an orange slice.
